mean_cn: n. （衬衫等的）袖口，腕套，手表带
mean_en: a band of plastic, paper, cloth, etc., that you wear around your wrist
sentence: The exhilarated fans at concert couldn't help but raise their hands with glowing wristbands.
sentence_trans: 这些兴奋的歌迷们情不自禁地举起手来，他们手上都带着荧光腕带。
word_etyma: wrist手腕 ＋ band带，连接 → wristband腕套
